text: Ebam anusarira balabe, kata'ina bhala hata, yadi amadigake prthibite phire yabara suyoga deya hata. Tahale amara'o tadera prati temani asantusta haye yetama, yemana tara asantusta hayeche amadera prati. Ebhabe'i allaha taâ€™ala taderake dekhabena tadera krtakarma taderake anutapta karara jan'ye. Athaca, tara kasminakale'o aguna theke bera hate parabe na.
